@ topherisher,

  In the description of this torrent, "Keus123" provided a link to a forum where you could download the fix and it had directions; my comment was in regards to that link. Since then, the fix has been uploaded via torrent to save people the hassle of registering in the forum and such. 
        The freezing only occurred for me during the T72U tank battle whenever I would try to fire weapons at the troops around the tank, but not at the actual tank. It also froze before the Helicopter boss battle. After going to the link and following the instructions, everything was fine. Just keep the two fix files on your memory stick, because it froze once me so I reapplied the patch and its been good since. So freezing once more in 13+ hours of play isn't so bad. I'm more concerned about my PSP overheating :)
oh, and Keus123- thanks!

I got the damn thing to work using ISOTOOL 1.52!

BUT FIRST OF ALL, you need:
1. unadultered/unpatched/fresh .iso file of the game (look for torrents containing file psy-mgspw.iso, I got mine from here:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5607981/Metal_Gear_Solid_Peace_Walker_USA_PSP_%5Bwww.forodescargasdirectas

2. You need a unit with CFW 5.00 m33-6

My current FW is 5.00 m33-6 in a FAT-100?.

1. I just downloaded ISOTOOL 1.52 and the latest PROMETHEUS v0.3 from psp-hacks.com.

2. Then I overwritten the PROMETHEUS folder in ISOTOOL with the contents of the latest PROMETHEUS.

3. I then copied the whole ISOTOOL folder into the PSP's memory stick (under PSP/GAME folder)

4. Then I copied the iso file psy-mgspw.iso (downloaded from another torrent) to the ISO folder.

5. I just ran ISOTOOL in the PSP, DECRYPTED the .iso file (saying YES to the 3 questions), then PATCHED the .iso file using the PROMETHEUS option in ISOTOOL.

6. After that I was playing for an hour straight with no problems.

It's my first time to patch an .iso file and it was such a no brainer. I never thought I could do it.

Mabuhay ang mga Pinoy! Yeah!
